description: Boris is a cranky, pig villager that first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori, and would originally appear only in its GameCube ports until making a return in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo. His name presumably comes from the word "boar", an animal similar to a pig, and usually wild. His initial phrase, "schnort", is pronounced similarly to "snort", a noise pigs and boars make. Similarly, his Japanese catchphrase is the Japanese equivalent of this sound.
